column4: hi guys, i have a problem: i have a dual boot ( Ubuntu & Vista) and i want to reinstall vista again. For that i have to restore my whole hard drive. How would i do this the best without losing Ubuntu?
sorry man you're gonna have to reinstall ubuntu
i've tried a few times to install windows after ubuntu and it's never worked
can someone help me with my sound? it was working fine last night and now i can't hear squat
i just have a restore and recovery cd from Lenovo that restores Vista but it doesn't work. I can just format the hard disk
hmm wouldn't there be another way
i don't have space to backup my ubuntu
backup your personal files and reinstall
i have more than 20 GB of files in Ubuntu
hmm how can i see in ubuntu how much GB is on that partition?
are you talking about the whole ubuntu partition or just your documents folder?
